headline.main: Founding of Fatah Is Celebrated in a Militant Mood

lead_paragraph: As ranks of marching masked men unleashed bursts of automatic gunfire into the air here today, Shahwan Abu Nijm savored the deafening tattoo echoing down Ramallah's main street. ''It's sweet,'' he said over the din of rifle shots as he watched the parade. ''Our people are still here, resisting, with the spirit of the uprising. Bullets are the only way to recover our country.''
abstract: Palestinians in Gaza City and Ramallah celebrate 36th anniversary of founding of Al Fatah, guerrilla organization, by Yasir Arafat; photo (M)
